rules_text:
Menace
At the beginning of your end step, if three or more nonland cards were put into a single graveyard this turn, you may cast a copy of Kanashi's back face without paying it's mana cost.
rules_text2: Exile up to two target cards from a single graveyard. Create a tapped 2/2 black Shade Advisor creature token for each creature card exiled this way.
flavor_text2: [i]Kanashi represents forgotten fears, and believes in understanding each of them.[/i]
